February 15, 1922.
My dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
This will acknowledge and thank you
for your letter of February 5, which has just
reached us.

Doctor Russell sailed for Brazil
on February 2 and will not return until May.
I shall hold your letter, however, for his
attention upon his return to the office.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Bessie G. Roche.
Secretary, F.F. Russell, M.D. Assistant Surgeon General H. R. Carter,
2121 California Street, N.W.
Washington, D. C.
